item.title: Finnish fintech trio make your everyday life easier
item.description:
Finnish fintech trio make your everyday life easier

Startup event Slush brings together some of Finland's most exciting startups in fintech. How to organise a massive pile of receipts after a trip and then split the costs between friends? Or what if you want to be an entrepreneur, but you don't have any accounting qualifications?

item.title: Slings and arrows
item.description:
Slings and arrows

FROM THE WAY Silicon Valley talks about banking, you might well conclude that the industry was ripe for oblivion. The T-shirt-wearing whizz-kids and their backers reckon that newcomers will do to JPMorgan Chase, HSBC and the rest what e-mail has done to post offices and Amazon to bookshops.

item.title: Financial technology in global markets
item.description:
Financial technology in global markets

Financial technology is an emerging global trend with numerous business opportunities to Finnish technology companies. The growth of Fintech is led by major financial centers: the US and the main European markets like the United Kingdom and Italy. In the UK alone, the Fintech market is worth Â£20bn.

item.title: Juho Isola
item.description:
Juho Isola

I am an Finnish entrepreneur. Hi, How Are You?

item.title: TAVIQ
item.description:
TAVIQ

This is my first company, TAVIQ. TAVIQ is a financial technology company based in Oulu, Finland. Our mission is to make private wealth management possible for everyone. This can be achieved by helping traditional wealth managers to digitize their services. This helps them to serve a new lower wealth customer segment.
